Package index

All functions

NetCoMi NetCoMi-package
NetCoMi: Network Comparison for Microbial Compositional Data

Graphlet Correlation Distance (GCD)
calcGCM()
Graphlet Correlation Matrix (GCM)
cclasso()
CCLasso: Correlation inference of Composition data through Lasso method
colToTransp()
Adding transparency to a color
createAssoPerm()
Create and store association matrices for permuted data

Constructing Differential Networks for Microbiome Data
.boottest()
Bootstrap Procedure for Testing Statistical Significance of Correlation Values

Compute associations between taxa
.calcProps()
Calculate network properties

Function for Generating Vector Names
